title: Techniques for Astral Travel and Spiritual Development.
first_phrase: This text explores techniques for achieving astral travel and separating the subtle body from the physical body, as explained by Ma Evola and Gichtel. Concentration, magic mirrors, and specific breathing rhythms are all employed to achieve this state, while the symbol of fire represents upward movement and spiritual force. The practice of vigilance is also discussed, as it intensifies one's presence and can lead to awakening. The final section details a practice for developing the "knowledge of fire," which involves focusing on the body's warmth and practicing willpower exercises using a mirror. These exercises aim to purify and rectify one's personality and cultivate forward momentum in life.

last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the symbol of fire and incorporating it into our daily practices can lead to a stronger presence, willpower, and purification of the self. Breathing exercises, vigilance, and gazing without blinking can all aid in developing this energy. Try the additional exercise of rhythmic breathing to further enhance the sense of warmth within the body. Remember to concentrate and be present in each moment of the practice.
